channel.title: My friends getting errors when try to run my vb prog
channel.description: I made my own program with vb 2005.., I click build and it works on my pc. My friends try to run it and they getting a error.., They cant run, whats wrong

item.title: My friends getting errors when try to run my vb prog
item.dc:creator: @Zach1188 Zach1188
item.description:
@Zach1188 wrote:

There could be a lot of reasons, but you can’t just say there’s a problem and expect us to know how to fix it. You need to post the program, and the problem he is having.

It may not even be your program, it could just be his computer.

Read full topic
